title: The Cradle is rocking
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Anthony Loem and Frank DeCola
brief_description: Traces the origins of jazz and depicts its continuing vitality in New Orleans, the city of its birth. Narrated by jazz musician, George Cola, it shows that jazz is still an expression of the daily joys and tribulations within the milieu from which it sprang many years ago. Cinematography by Tom Davenport.
